[Contents]
      4. Extension Modules
        4.5. Module Support Functions

4.5.15. besNEWDOUBLE

[<<<] [>>>]

Create a new double and return the pointer to it. This macro calls the function memory_NewDouble().

See also

  • besNEWSTRING
  • besNEWLONG
  • besNEWREF
  • besNEWDOUBLE
  • besNEWARRAY @end itemize
    [<<<] [>>>]
